At the time, the A340 family was a long-range, four engine airliner meant to cross oceans as regulations allowed it to.

In-Game

The A340-500 is the most popular at 90+ units, followed by the -200 at 60+ units in circulation. The -300 has 10+ units and the =600 has a measly 2 units in circulation.
